==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Geo Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Bedrock Line
|desc_1      = Grants a shield to all Lil' Fungi on the team. The shield will will incoming DMG up to '''70%''' of the protected Fungus' Max [[HP]]. The shield will be removed after 10 seconds. While shielded, Lil' Fungi also gain a incoming [[poise damage]] reduction of '''70%'''.
|file_1      = Stretchy Geo Fungus Bedrock Line 2

|name_2      = Fierce Strike
|desc_2      = Performs 1 rapid melee strike, dealing '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. 

|name_3      = Crystal Condensate
|desc_3      = Its Physical [[RES]] and all Elemental RES are increased by '''40%'''. 
}}
